roleset.name: to stamp with a postmark
roleset.note: POSTMARK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'postmark' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from postmark.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Returns for 1988 from people with six-month filing extensions were due Monday , but the IRS says [0] people in the disaster areas wo n't be penalized [*-1]for late filing if their returns are marked [*-2] `` Hugo '' and postmarked by Jan. 16 .
